sourceDesc.p: The contents are extracted from the original source which includes articles in a number of different indigenous Mexican languages. The other articles were not included in this document.

ab.seg: The wolf spider is called tintoo savi in the Mixtec language spoken in the town of Mixtepec (saꞌan savi).

div.head: Tintoo savi ~ Araña lobo ~ Wolf spider

ab.label: Tintoo savi:1
ab.seg: there.is a spider animal/insect is.called spider rain

Tintoo savi:5.2
